#summary Getting started Guide for the Joose framework

= Introduction =

This page gives some hints on where to go after you downloaded and [installed Installation] Joose.

= Steps to mastering Joose =

# Check out the Cookbook. The [CookbookRecipe1 first] shows you how create a simple Class with two attributes. The other entries are linked from the [http://code.google.com/p/joose-js/ Homepage]
# Try out the class browser example. You can try it [http://it.test.avantaxx.de/xssinterface/projects/Joose/examples/class_browser.html online] or open the file examples/class_browser.html from the Joose download in your web browser.
